company_context: ABM Platform for B2B Sales & Marketing Success | Demandbase Open navigation Grow high-quality pipeline faster with the only AI platform built for how B2B really buys Demandbase unifies your data, aligns every GTM team, and turns signals into revenue based on the buying groups behind every decision Watch a demo Book a meeting Winning teams use Demandbase to grow 3X increase in conversions Adobe +52% increase in revenue SAP Concur +50% growth in average deal size Thermo Fisher Scientific +83% increase in pipeline velocity Ingram Micro Your sales and marketing simplified. Amplified by AI. AI built on 20 years of B2B data. From intent detection to automated plays, Demandbase orchestrates your whole revenue engine. Identify and engage the right buying groups in your accounts, not just contacts—at exactly the right moment—with messages tailored to exactly what they need. See what’s behind our data Pipeline AI automates your next best move Demandbase blends 1st, 2nd, and 3rd-party data into a single account view, then drives actions across sales and marketing, so you turn intent into pipeline at scale. Discover Agentbase See the full buying group Identify and engage entire buying groups, not just individual contacts, Blend all your account signals into a live view of every buying group and reach out exactly when they’re ready. Target buying groups Connect every team, tool, and data source Make it yours. Flexible, open and transparent, Demandbase connects seamlessly to your tech stack. Customize it, scale it, or use our data in your tools. You’re in control. See integrations The pipeline AI platform that unifies data, insights, and actions for true GTM outcomes Data from everywhere. Data you can trust. Integrate your first and our third-party party data to know who is in-market and what they are signaling. We always ensure that you have the best quantity and trusted quality of data fueling your business decisions. 1st Party: CRM, MAP, web activity, chat, email & calendar, and more. 3rd Party: Account ID, contact & buying group ID, firmographic, technographic, action and intent signals. AI-powered insights that you can see Harness transparent and tunable go-to-market intelligence generated through advanced AI and machine learning. Know who, how, when, and where to target with confidence. Most importantly, we’ll tell you why (it’s not a black box). Act with confidence Know your next best actions across marketing, advertising, and sales. All the data and insights in the world are not worth anything if you don’t act on them. Activate with clarity across all your go-to-market channels with the right automation, controls, measurement, and reporting. Unify your tech stack with integrations & APIs Enable seamless data flow for action anywhere. We’ll meet you where you are across your sales and marketing tech stack. Allow the data and insights to flow wherever you want them to be. Advertising CRM Marketing automation Content marketing platform Web personalization

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours unify their data and turn it into actionable insights. I came across your company and saw that you're using Demandbase, which is a great tool, but I think our solution can complement it really well. Can I take a minute to explain how?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Okay, I'll give you a minute. But make it quick. We're pretty happy with our current setup.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. So, DeepData AI uses machine learning to process large amounts of data and provide real-time insights. It can help you identify new opportunities, optimize your sales and marketing efforts, and even predict customer churn. We've seen some great results with our existing clients, and I think it could really benefit your team as well.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (interrupting) That sounds interesting, but we're not looking to add any new solutions right now. We just implemented Demandbase and we're still getting used to it. Plus, I'm not sure if we have the budget for another tool.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand. Implementing a new solution can be a big undertaking, and budget is always a concern. However, I'd like to propose that our solution can actually help you get more out of your existing tools, including Demandbase. We've had clients who have seen a significant increase in ROI after implementing our solution. And in terms of budget, we offer flexible pricing plans that can fit your needs. Would you be open to discussing this further in a demo?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (firmly) Look, I appreciate the offer, but I don't think we're interested. We're locked into a contract with our current data processing provider, and we're not looking to make any changes right now. Plus, I'm not convinced that your solution would be worth the cost. I think we'll have to pass.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand, and I appreciate your honesty. Can I at least send you some more information about our solution, in case you change your mind in the future?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (declining) No, that's okay. I think we're good. Thanks for reaching out, but we're not interested in DeepData AI at this time.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Alright, I understand. Thank you for your time, and I wish you all the best with your current setup.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (final decision) Yeah, thanks. We'll stick with what we have for now.

analysis.raw:
Score: 2
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more thoroughly addressed the buyer's concerns about being locked into a contract and not looking to make changes, potentially offering a future follow-up or alternative solutions. Sentiment: Negative

parsed.feedback: The seller should have more thoroughly addressed the buyer's concerns about being locked into a contract and not looking to make changes, potentially offering a future follow-up or alternative solutions. Sentiment: Negative
